Age Verification

Please provide information so that we may verify you are of at least 21 years of age.

Your legal name and date of birth will be used to verify your age via public record.We can best verify your age using:

  • Addresses on State IDs like your driver's license.
  • A permanent address where you recelive bills.
  • A previous permanent address where you lived for at least one year.
